settings.name: Reference timestamp
settings.description: Define you reference time, if you dont enter a time, per default this is NOW.

settings.name: Longitude of reference position
settings.description: Select longitude of your reference position, distance to it will be calculated.

settings.name: Latitude of reference position
settings.description: Select latitude of your reference position, distance to it will be calculated.

settings.name: Migration distance (7 days)
settings.description: Define radius (in m) of which the animal must move out to define as migration behaviour.

settings.name: Dead indication distance (7 days)
settings.description: Define radius (in m) in which the animal must remain to be defined as dead.
